question:
6.) ....... Mary reading a book in her classroom at this moment?    a. Is
b. am
c. was
d. Were

7 Susan and Susanna ......... writing poems for an English cubiect now
a. is 
b. Are 
c. Am
d. Be

Pliss bantu Lagi Kakak Besok ujian saya harus di kumpul​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

6.) ....... Mary reading a book in her classroom at this moment?

a. Is

b. am

c. was

d. Were

7 Susan and Susanna ......... writing poems for an English cubiect now

a. is

b. Are

c. Am

d. Be

Penjelasan:

Jawaban dicetak tebal dan menggunakan bentuk Present Continuous Tense. Nomor 6. karena subjeknya Mary, maka Tobe nya adalah a. is.

Nomor 7. karena subjeknya Susan dan Susanna, maka Tobe nya adalah b. are.

Semoga membantu ya.

C. One hundred and two
B. One thousand

answers.answer:
A. one hundred

( angka sebelum 101 adalah 100 )

related_questions.question: Change the sentences into negative and interrogative a. my mother always give mea a present for my birthday b. he knew the answer off the question c. rudi and anto arema playing badminton now

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

1. - My mother never gives me a present for my birthday?

? Does your mother give you a present for your birthday?

2. - He didn't know the answer of the question

? Did he know the answer of the question?

3. - Rudi and Anto are not playing badminton now

? Are they playing badminton now?

Penjelasan:

hope you find this helpful^•^

Jawaban:

1. B

2. C

3. C

4. C

5. D

6. A

7. B

related_questions.question:

Rudi likes playing gootball and basket ball every week.
He never comes late to scholl. He always respects
(menghormati) and obeys (mematuhi) his parents and
teachers.
29. Who is Rudi?
a. A student
b. A teacher
c. A player
d. A football player

30. Where is he studying? 
a. SMP 12 c. SMP 14
b. SMP 13 d. A football player

31. How does he go to school?
a. By bisycle c. By bus
b. By car d. on foot 

32. Does he like basketball? 
a. Yes, he don't c. Yes, he does
b. Yes, he liket d. Yes, he did
​

answers.answer:

29. a. A student

30. b. SMP 3

31. d. On foot

32. c. Yes, he does

Semoga membantu..
